jmud.command
Class CommandTemplate

java.lang.Object
  jmud.command.CommandTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
Commands, Look, Quit, Say
public abstract class CommandTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract command class for implementing all commands.

Author:
Will Pall

          The command object that this template handles.

          Constructs a new command based on the template that is based off the command object given by "command".

Method Detail

exec

public abstract boolean exec(ClientDescriptor descriptor,
                             java.lang.String args)
Executes the command for the given descriptor with the given arguments.

Parameters:
descriptor - Client descriptor that used the command
args - Command arguments
Returns:
True if the command was successful or false if not
